remarks: A poset element less than or equal to an atom is either an atom or zero.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2012.)
statement:
leatom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
leatom.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
leatom.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
leatom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
leat3 $p |- ( ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ X .<_ P ) -> ( X e. A \/ X = .0. ) ) $.
